description:
In today's Fix of entertainment news:
An image was released from the upcoming A24 biopic, The Smashing Machine, showing Dwyane Johnson's insane transformation into MMA legend Mark Kerr. Featuring a wig and probably facial prosthetics, The Rock looks almost nothing like his previous self (and maybe a little like former WWE superstar and Olympic gold medalist Kurt Angle). In other news, Marvel's Vision series is picking up steam as the company has hired a new showrunner and set a 2026 release date. And finally, Netflix released a teaser for the upcoming season of The Witcher, this one with Liam Hemsworth taking over the lead role from Henry Cavill.

#IGN
title: The Rock's Remarkable Transformation In New A24 Movie - IGN The Fix: Entertainment

description: Akuma has two completely secret Super Moves that aren't found in the command list and are actually locked behind a secret taunt. Here's how to perform not only his two secret super moves, but also his classic double air fireball attack once powered up by the secret taunt.
title: Street Fighter 6: How to Perform Akuma's Secret Supers

description:
In the nearly half century since Mad Max first appeared in The Wasteland, The Road Warrior has transitioned from single-minded instrument of revenge to mythic folk hero to, well, absent. It’s been a slow, steady and very intentional transition. We talked with George Miller about the franchise that’s been his pride and joy for decades, the constant reinvention and reformatting of the series, even while continuing to explore the core concept that he first tackled with the original film back in 1979, and why the Mad Max franchise is sturdy enough to stand on it’s own without its title character.

While the first three Mad Max movies – 1979’s Mad Max, 1981’s Mad Max 2, a.k.a. The Road Warrior, and 1985’s Mad Max Beyond Thunderdome – all feature Mel Gibson’s iconic take on the character, there are shifts in the world-building between films, as well as echoes from one to the next, that seem to bend, if not outright break, continuity. The Mad Max universe is almost like the anti-MCU in this
title: Why the Mad Max Movies Don’t Need Mad Max Anymore | Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga

description:
In today's Daily Fix:
The first Helldivers hit PC and PlayStation consoles (and Vita!) back in 2015, but it was Helldivers 2 that put developer Arrowhead Game Studios on the map. Following the sequel's massive success, Arrowhead now has grand ambitions, aiming to be the next Blizzard Entertainment or FromSoftware. Via  GamesIndustry.biz, Chief Creative Officer Johan Pilestedt said he wants to "see how high we can fly" and the studio as the potential to be the next Blizzard. In other news, gameplay has now leaked from Valve's new hero shooter, now called Deadlock. The game operates like Valve's MOBA, Dota 2, but has tower defense mechanics and an Overwatch vibe. And finally, the Nintendo Switch is getting a new exclusive in the form of Picross S Namco Legendary Edition, available on May 30 via the eShop. Don't sleep on these games, they're awesome.

#IGN #Gaming #Helldivers2
title: Helldivers 2 Devs Want to Be the Next FromSoftware - IGN Daily Fix

description: Get ready to explore a custom Mario-themed world with Minecraft's Super Mario Mash-Up pack. Watch the latest trailer for Minecraft for a look at the Nintendo Switch exclusive Super Mario Mash-Up pack, featuring 15 tracks and 40 player skins inspired by the Super Mario series.
title: Minecraft - Official Super Mario Mash-Up Pack Trailer

description:
With the passing of Dragon Ball creator Akira Toriyama, we look back on his indelible mark on not just pop-culture but his direct influence on video games, including Sonic and Mario. Learn all about Akira Toriyama's influence on games as we explore the legendary manga artist’s legacy. 

Since he first published his smash hit gag manga Dr. Slump, Toriyama’s illustrious body of work has permeated into the world of professional wrestling, American cartoons, and Hollywood blockbuster films. In the wake of his death, creators from around the world, like the world-renowned creators of Bleach, Naruto, and One Piece and up-and-coming mangaka alike mourned his passing and celebrated his pivotal influence on their works.

#Gaming #DragonBall #Manga
title: Akira Toriyama's Undeniable Influence on Video Games

description:
Red Dead Redemption 2 has lots to dive into, and we've got you covered! These are some of the topics we most frequently get asked for help with in Red Dead Redemption 2.

For more on Red Dead Redemption 2, check out our Wiki guide at https://www.ign.com/wikis/red-dead-redemption-2

#IGN #Gaming #RedDeadRedemption2
title: Red Dead Redemption 2's Biggest Guide Questions Answered!

description:
Watch our Starfield May update performance review. Bethesda has been busy with updates across Starfield and Fallout 4. Following a review last month of Fallout 4, we now take flight with Starfield's wealth of new modes, graphical updates and improvements on Xbox Series X and PC. Can the new modes unlock 60 or 120fps on Xbox Series X? How much does DLSS3 & FSR3 frame generation improve the PC experience? And have Xbox Series S players been lost in space? All that and more is covered in our Starfield May update IGN Performance Review.

Chapters
0:00 - Introduction & contents
0:36 - How the game has improved since launch & testing methodology
2:14 - Xbox Series X and Series S new modes tested
4:12 - Xbox Series X Performance testing All modes including 120fps
8:25 - PC comparisons - CPU improvements tested against launch
10:40 - PC comparisons - GPU improvements/updates tested against launch
12:23 - PC performance scaling tests across hardware
14:40 - DLSS3, FSR3 Frame generation tested
title: Starfield May Update: Xbox Series X|S & PC Performance Review

description: Unleash your inner botanist and biologist by crossbreeding plants and animals and gathering resources to craft items and even conduct experiments in Honeycomb: The World Beyond, a survival-sandbox game set on the vibrant alien planet Sora7.
title: Honeycomb: The World Beyond - Official Story Trailer

description:
Check out the Dragon Ball Xenoverse 2: Future Saga Chapter 1 launch trailer which puts a spotlight on content coming to the DLC, including new extra missions, parallel quests, and new characters like Android 18 (DB Super), Videl (DB Super), Vegeta (Super Saiyan God) Ultra Supervillain, Goku Black (Super Saiyan Rose) Ultra Supervillain, and Broly (Restrained), along with loading screen illustrations and more. The trailer also gives a peek at what's coming in the free Update 18, including new costumes, 7 new raid quests, and more. Chapter 1 of Future Saga DLC for Dragon Ball Xenoverse 2 launches on May 24, 2024.

#DragonBall #Gaming #Games
title: Dragon Ball Xenoverse 2 - Official Future Saga Chapter 1 Launch Trailer

description:
Watch the What If…? – An Immersive Story trailer for the first-ever interactive Disney+ original story. The new mixed reality experience will be released on May 30, 2024 exclusively on Apple Vision Pro as a free app for a limited time. 

Step into the leading role of an hour-long, narrative-driven journey and help The Watcher as you face dangerous variants from across the Multiverse, including fan-favorite characters like Thanos, Hela, the Collector, Red Guardian, and more. Under the guidance of Wong, learn how to cast mystic spells, harness the power of the Infinity Stones, and be faced with reality-defining choices.

What If…? – An Immersive Story is directed by Dave Bushore at Marvel Studios and produced by Shereif M. Fattouh at ILM Immersive. The experience is written by David Dong and Phil McCarty (The Learning Curve), with music by Oscar-nominated and Emmy-winning composer Laura Karpman (American Fiction, The Marvels). What If…? – An Immersive Story is executive produced by Bush
title: What If…? – An Immersive Story - Official Trailer

description:

description:
Master Sol (Lee Jung-jae) squares off against Mae (Amandla Stenberg) in this very first clip released from Star Wars: The Acolyte.

An investigation into a shocking crime spree pits a respected Jedi Master (Lee Jung-jae) against a dangerous warrior from his past (Amandla Stenberg). As more clues emerge, they travel down a dark path where sinister forces reveal all is not what it seems….

Star Wars: The Acolyte will begin streaming on Disney+ on June 4th.
title: Star Wars: The Acolyte - Exclusive Clip (2024) Lee Jung-jae, Amandla Stenberg

description: Leonida and Florida have a lot in common, and in this episode of GTFM we play a game where we compare crimes that have taken place in GTA Vice City and Grand Theft Auto Vice City Stories, to actual crimes that have taken place in Florida. We ask the question, is it IRL Florida Man or GTA Florida Man? #RockstarGames dropped the #GTA6 trailer last year, but when can we expect to see the second Grand Theft Auto 6 trailer, going into further details on what to expect? We got our first look at what to expect in terms of graphics, narrative tone for the story, and a clear look at our main protagonist Lucia. We also got a release window for the game, with it coming to us in 2025. But the first trailer for #GTA6 left a lot to be desired. Akeem Lawanson, along with special guest panelists J.D. Witherspoon and Goldenboy take a look at the previous #RockstarGames trailer release schedules for its major AAA games to come up with a speculative yet logical timeline for the second trailer hitting th
title: GTA 6: Why Florida Is The Perfect Playground For Parody | GTFM

description:
Here's the Street Fighter 6 Akuma launch trailer! Unleash your inner demon with the release of Akuma, the fiercest warrior to hit the streets in SF6, available to play now across PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox Series X/S, PS4 (PlayStation 4), and PC via Steam.

Akuma is now live across the popular fighting game's World Tour, Fighting Ground, and Battle Hub modes. The latest SF6 character also arrives alongside two new Battle Hub experiences, four new Outfit 3 designs, several notable balance updates for all existing characters on the roster, and more. Check out the SF6 Akuma trailer to see what's new.

#StreetFighter #StreetFighter6 #Gaming
title: Street Fighter 6 - Official Akuma Update Launch Trailer

description: Dave the Diver is getting its literal biggest DLC yet, as it stars Godzilla! The free DLC drops tomorrow (May 23) for PC (via Steam), PS5, PS4, and Nintendo Switch.
title: Dave the Diver x Godzilla - Official DLC Launch Trailer
